author: fatimaflash
content: Well thanks to <@!301186049323958275> who made it readable, I have just published an article trying to give an easy explanation of what EIP-1559 is all about

author: iannorden
content: Opened an EIP PR to remove what reads like a circular dep in the parameters definition https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2768. It is now in accordance with besu's implementation (correct me if I'm wrong <@!574864862338088960>) and what I am reverting the geth implementation to.
